name: devpro-portfolio-template-for-developer
title: Devpro - Portfolio Template for Developer
desc: DevPro is a Astro portfolio template designed for developer who want to showcase their skills with a bold style.
article:
DevPro is a Astro Tailwind template designed for developer who want to showcase their skills with a bold aesthetic. DevPro transforms your portfolio into an immersive journey with glowing animations, a sleek programmer icon backdrop, and a customizable neon interface that pulses with energy.


Your projects will command attention like never before. Whether you're a frontend sorcerer, backend architect, or full-stack innovator, this template ensures your portfolio stands out in a sea of generic designs. Ready to level up?

  • GitHub Contribution Style

  • Fully customizable with utility-first classes
  • Lightweight interactivity
  • Optimized for all devices with blazing performance â¡
  • Programmer Room Setup Hero Sections
  • Project Showcase

â¡ Quick Setup:

  • Download & unzip the template
  • Run npm install to install dependencies
  • Start dev server: npm run dev
  • Customize colors, content, and character animations
  • Build for production: npm run build
